channel.title: Games on Ecology Games
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Ecology Games

item.title: Ecology Games
item.description: This website aims to keep you up to date with the latest news in the world of Ecology Games.

item.title: NEWS: Masters Thesis Evaluating Raccoon Rampage
item.description: Pamela Neff’s Master’s thesis explores the effectiveness of “BioInvasions: Raccoon Rampage”, a board game designed to educate players about the complexities of managing invasive species, specifically raccoons in Europe.

item.title: BioInvasions: Raccoon Rampage!
item.description: BioInvaders: Raccoon Rampage is a semi-cooperative board game where players take on roles like environmental agencies, hunters, or animal rights lobbyists, each with their own unique agenda. While working together to prevent raccoons from wreaking ecological havoc across Europe, players must also balance collaboration with rivalries to achieve their personal objectives.

item.title: NEWS: Ecology Games Domain Purchased (Finally)
item.description: Buying a .eu domain is tricky if you are in the UK!

item.title: Hugo Theme Walden
item.description: After reading Walden, a collection of essays by American writer Henry David Thoreau, I was deeply influenced by his love of nature and simple living. So, I wrote this concise and clear theme for my personal website and named it Walden.
